transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji. OSM deal se baat kar rahe hain hum. OSM deal se baat kar rahe hain Mr. Sahil Arora.
Executive: Haan ji. Haan ji sir very good afternoon. Sir Shikshit Tiwari bol raha tha main IndiaMART ke head office se kya haal chaal hai sir Pragati ji ka manager baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Kaun bol raha hai?
Executive: Sir Shikshit Tiwari baat kar raha hun main.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir sir aapki ek aayi hai request aayi hai sir refund ke liye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To sir aap dekhiye aap se meri pehle bhi to baat hui hai na sir ki sir aap service use kariye. Wahan pe jahan bhi help ki jarurat hogi sir hum log har tarike se help karne ke liye taiyar hain. Aap ek baar service use kariye sir refund ki to policy sir ab is tarike se to sir hamare paas refund hamare paas refund ki policy hi nahi hai sir. Agar refund ki policy se to aapko itni baar sir customer care pe call karne ki jarurat padti. Agar koi bhi process hai sir agar company ke andar wo policy made hai to ek employee kyun mana karega aap batao. Kisi bhi company ka sir customer care ya cooperation ko.
Customer: Meri baat suno aapko ek baat main kitni baar bata dun. Theek hai ji. Aur main nahi chahta ki main pehle aapke ek executive ko apni baat bataun. Theek hai sari baat fir se samjhaun. Jo main already teen mahine pehle samjha chuka hun aur bahut baar beech mein bhi hamari call pe baat hui hai unko bhi baar baar samjha chuka hun. Uske baad unke senior ka call aata hai fir aapka call aata hai. So this is just wasting my time. Aur dekho bhai seedhi si baat hai main already social media pe just main apna post dal raha hun. If you want main aapko screenshot share kar deta hun ki aapke ke dwara mujhe ho gaya tha. Theek hai ji. Aur agar mere ko na bolna chahta to obviously ye samajh mein hai main na karta. Dekhiye dost main dekho koi ya to koi bachcha nahi hun ya koi matlab aisa nahi hai ki main ye cheez karun. But jahan mere ko problem hai to hai bhai.
Executive: Sir wo problem ka to solution aapko bol diya. Nahi sir solution koi de hi nahi rahe na aap na mere ko solution ab milega. Kyunki teen mahine aapne mere aise hi uda diye hue hain.
Executive: Sir teen mahine mein to aapka jo problem tha problem to ye tha na sir aapka ki aapko business mein aapko business mein loss hua tha to aap sab jagah se apni recovery le rahe the to aapne kaha ki IndiaMART se bhi mere ko recovery de. Problem to ye aapki thi sir starting mein jab meri aapse baat hui thi to aapne kaha ki aapko kuch losses chal rahe hain aap sab jagah se is tarah apne sab jagah se sab jagah se apne stop kar rahe hain. Iski wajah se.
Customer: To sir ab dekho bhai haan yahi.
Executive: Tyagi ji. Dekho ab koi fayda nahi hai baat karne ka main bahut is tarah se request kar raha hun. Achcha sir ek baat bataiye aapki team se aapki company se to mere ko jo bhi agar aapne resolution koi dena ho to.
Customer: Social media pe bhi jayenge. Main batata hun dekho sir social media pe bhi jayenge. Koi bhi agar main hun main apna khud ka individual aapko kuch nahi bata raha na ya Pragati nahi hai social media koi bhi team hai sir agar social media bhi team hai ya koi bhi to sir wo IndiaMART ki policy ke andar hi to aata hai na sir. To IndiaMART ki policy hi to hum aapko bata rahe hain na. Aap mujhe rehne do theek hai fir ab main sir agar service karna hai maine nahi nahi jahan pe activate karna hai main fir karne ja raha hun theek hai ji. To sir mujhe ek baat bataiye aap agar nahi dusri baat sir aapko maine ek cheez bola tha na ki sir agar aapko kisi ne ye cheez likh ke diya hai ki agar IndiaMART se business nahi aata hai hum aapka refund kar denge to IndiaMART business ke commitment ka to kabhi kisi bhi seller ke sath sir ye commitment nahi karti IndiaMART ki hum aapko business kara ke denge. Hum aapko definitely aapka promotion karenge aap meri baat suno service ki commitment karte ho aap. Service mein hum aapka promotion karte hain aap active rahiye sir IndiaMART pe jo hamare paas traffic aayega usme maximum.
Customer: Commitment kis cheez ki karta hai IndiaMART?
Executive: Sir dekho commitment to kisi cheez ki nahi karte hum log commitment service pe advertisement industries hai sir aap khud bhi jante hain ki agar hum promotion kar rahe hain promotion se agar visibility hogi to kahin na kahin sir buyers bhi milenge. Business ek possibility hai sir business mein commitment to sir koi bhi kaise de sakta hai aap batao Google se bhi agar aap service le rahe ho ya kahin se bhi kisi bhi market se sir agar koi bhi cheez le rahe ho to uska sir ye commitment kaise de sakta hai mujhe khud nahi pata ki aaj evening mein mere paas kitne buyer aayenge aaj pure din mein aur wo jo buyer aayenge wo kis time pe aayenge to ye commitment koi kaise kisi ko de sakta hai sir ki sir aapko itne buyer mil jayenge count to mujhe bhi nahi pata na ki mere paas is month mein kitne buyer ka traffic aane wala hai approx hota hai ki hamare paas aapke product ki categories mein itne buyer ka monthly traffic hai ab us monthly traffic mein jab wo buyer ke landing IndiaMART pe ho rahi hai us samay aap online hain aapne search kiya aapke samne lead dikhi aapne click kiya is cheez ka sir commitment kaise koi de sakta hai aap bataiye.
Customer: Bhai meri baat suno agar in cheezon ki commitment nahi hai. To hai hi kya aap service use kariye. Aap apni services pe khade ho na. Aapki jo leads bhi mere ko aayi hai wo sari fake thi theek hai unme se koi bhi mere koi kaam ki nahi thi lead aur na ab mere ko un cheezon se koi kaam bhi karwana hai aur seedhi si baat hai dekho maine aap se ab apna time waste nahi karna ji main kisi se baat nahi karna chahta call pe ya kaise bhi jo bhi hai mere ko email pe aao aap maine email already forward kar di hui hai. Dusri cheez ye hai ki main apni post dal raha hun agar aapne dekhni hai ya to apni ID de do aapko bhi tag kar deta hun beech mein Dinesh ji ko kar diya ji aur Brijesh ji ko maine tag kar diya beech mein aapke IndiaMART ke official page ko kar diya hua tag. So jo bhi hoga ab to let it be right main unko ye sab lekin kisi cheez ka ek reason hota hai na sir ki kisi ek cheez pe aap business ko leke issues hai concerns hai to aap business mein sir aap pehle services use karna start kariye abhi aapka time bacha hua hai aapko refund aa jayega. Maine jitna dekho jitna use karna tha na main pehle kar chuka hun use. Dekho ab main aur jyada time waste nahi karna chahta apna bhai seedhi si baat hai yaar ab mere ko bhi ab itna phone mat karo. Theek hai. Kyunki mera baar baar ye time hi kharab ho raha hai ki main aap se baat kar raha hun aur upar se main apna kaam nahi kar pa raha jo abhi main kar raha hun Facebook pe. Theek hai ji. To yahi hai ki ab theek hai yahan se tata bye bye karte hain to hum social media pe hi milenge dusra legal pe hi milenge theek hai ji. Aap apni ID de do main aapko bhi tag kar dunga. Sir aisa kyun karne ki jarurat hai matlab us aisa kyun karne ki jarurat hai aap jis prospective se sir IndiaMART pe aaye the aap waise service ko use kariye sir business aa jayega aapke product ki category log business kar rahe hain sir. My purpose right IndiaMART has not served my purpose so I am not going to give you another chance being three months already that I been asking for the same thing. To refund my money because I am not being able to use your service also the leads are just fake and irrelevant to my product. Aur usse pehle bhi jo match wala system tha wo bhi just all just ab main kya hi bolun usko. To it's better ki we disconnect the call and I am going to post on Facebook first and then if I don't get see any replies then I'll move to other social platforms like Instagram and Google par. Sir aisa matlab main main seedhi bolunga main to yahi bolunga sir ki kyun aisa karna jab hum log aapke support ke liye nahi khade hote tab to ye kaam karte na sir. Kyun kar rahe hain aap? khade na support ke liye aur mera please dekho. Itna mere khayal 11:30 baje se call aayi thi Abhishek ki aur tab se ab tak main bas aise hi fasa hua hun theek hai aapki kabhi kisi ki call aa rahi hai so that is not. Theek hai aap mujhe ek baar time dijiye main ek baar baat kar leta hun internally main ek baar dobara baat kar leta hun. Haan ji sir koi nahi aap kar lo baat mere ko phone kar lena but main wo dal hi raha hun post yaar. Nahi sir usko mat daliye main aap baat kar leta hun. Bhai dekho. Tyagi ji bhai ki tarah baat kar raha hun aisa kuch koi system nahi hai theek hai aap baat kar lo mere ko bata do jab agar mere ko uska kuch mil jata hai to I'll see I'll see what I can do for it but for now main apna decision nahi change karne wala kyunki teen mahine already ho chuke hain bas pehle to main ye keh raha tha ki mere ko mera sabka de do ab to main yahi kahun unko bhi main request ki hai mere ko sara hi chahiye apna kyunki I been getting harassed from last three months kisi cheez ke ek hi cheez ka mere ko lara lagaya ja raha hai ki pehle koi keh dete nahi hai fir kehte ki hum aage baat karenge so that is not up to that is not the style of my working and I don't deal in these things now anymore. To thank you so much Tyagi ji I am disconnecting the call aap inquiry kar lo aage baat ko mere ko bata dena theek hai. Theek hai sir main karta hun. Disconnect. Theek hai okay. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requests a refund for the subscription.

- Feels leads are fake and irrelevant.

- States he has been harassed for 3 months.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund policy not available.

- Executive explained IndiaMART's service commitments.

- Executive offered to discuss internally and call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss internally and call back.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, social media
